pageContext.claim: “The tax cuts …  put a lot of people to work and really gave companies something where they're now coming back into our country, they're investing in our country, and they're expanding in our country.”
pageContext.analysis: Many economists say the impact of Trump's tax cuts has been muted. The changes "appeared to have no major impact on businesses’ capital investment or hiring plans," according to a survey by the National Association of Business Economics.
